chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:

Dear ladies and gentlemen,
I purchased this iPhone in a condition of 'excellent' but unfortunately, the casing on the front is damaged (see pictures) at two points exceeding 50cm. I kindly request that you replace this iPhone.

I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Markus Kepper

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

The customer called me and asked about his exchange.

You have received the product for exchange/grade issue the 24.05.24. 

Do you have any news regarding the exchange so that we can pass this on to the customer?

Thank you for your help.

Have a nice day.

Best regards,
Astrid from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stocks available for an exchange. Instead we have fully refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
